column1: K.8 - Holidays Observed by the Federal Reserve System 2017-2021

For holidays falling on Saturday, Federal Reserve Banks and Branches will be open the preceding Friday; however, the Board of Governors will be closed. For holidays falling on Sunday, all Federal Reserve offices will be closed the following Monday.
* Saturday - the Board of Governors is closed on November 10, 2017, July 3, 2020, and December 24, 2021.
** Sunday - the Board of Governors is closed on November 12, 2018 and July 5, 2021.
The Board of Governors is closed in observance of Inauguration Day on January 20, 2017 and January 20, 2021.
